pages.title: About | Sam Lustig Photo
pages.description: Sam is a seasoned Event Photographer and Portrait Photographer living in the Philadelphia Metro Area. He driven by a relentless pursuit of visually striking imagery that encapsulates the very essence of his subjects.

headings.text: Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability

pages.text_content: About | Sam Lustig Photo top of pageBOOKING 2026 | LIMITED AVAILABILITY FOR 2025 |LUSTIGPHOTO@GMAIL.COM | (513) 504-4927SAM LUSTIG PHOTOProfessional Photography in PhiladelphiaEVENTSHEADSHOTSHeadshots | What Sets Us ApartHeadshots | RetouchingServicesFOOD & PRODUCTContactAboutPersonalLandscapesClimbingMusicBlogMoreUse tab to navigate through the menu items.AboutSam Lustig is a photographer based in Philadelphia, PA. It’s a city with character. Sam's kind of a character too. He’s made a name for himself photographing real people in real moments. Business professionals, university graduates, corporate teams, and everyone in between. His work is clean and honest, confident, but doesn't try too hard. You’ll notice it in his headshots, in his event coverage, in the way people look at ease in front of his lens. That’s not by accident. ​ Sam has always cared about doing good work. Not flashy for the sake of it. Not trendy. Just good, thoughtful, dependable work. He shows up early, listens more than he talks, and takes pride in getting the details right, especially the ones nobody notices until they’re wrong. ​ If you're looking for someone to make you or your team look like the best version of yourselves, with sincerity, skill, and just enough light in the eyes, Sam’s probably a good person to call.​ He loves traveling, living out of his Honda Pilot camper while on the road, accompanied by his partner, Emily, as they traverse picturesque landscapes. During their journeys, their beloved cats, Nadia, Lefty and Scooter wait for them at home, mewing endlessly and stealing into the laps of anyone will sit near them. Sam is also an avid rock climber and has climbed all over the US. He has also recently started surfing and mountain biking, surfing being one of the greatest challenges that he has ever undertaken. Through all of his endeavors, both personal and professional, runs a theme of unwavering commitment to conquering challenges. Below are an assortment of images from Sam's personal life.  They will be updated here periodically.  Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability513-504-4927LustigPhoto@gmail.com© 2025 BY SAM LUSTIGPrivacy Policybottom of page

headings.text:
Frequently Asked Questions
Event Photography in Philadelphia
Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability

pages.text_content: Philadelphia Event Photographer | Sam Lustig Photo | Book Today top of pageBOOKING 2026 | LIMITED AVAILABILITY FOR 2025 |LUSTIGPHOTO@GMAIL.COM | (513) 504-4927SAM LUSTIG PHOTOProfessional Photography in PhiladelphiaEVENTSHEADSHOTSHeadshots | What Sets Us ApartHeadshots | RetouchingServicesFOOD & PRODUCTContactAboutPersonalLandscapesClimbingMusicBlogMoreUse tab to navigate through the menu items.Event Photography In PhiladelphiaEvent Photos That Boost Your Brand and Tell Your Story.Check Out Our Latest Work Or, if you're ready to talkGet In Touch Now What We Do We specialize in professional Event Photography in Philadelphia, capturing the energy and key moments of corporate conferences, private events, and large gatherings of all kinds. We deliver high-quality images to clients who need professional, impactful photography that enhances their brand, captures key moments, and tells their unique story. Using top-tier equipment, we deliver vibrant photos with a fast turnaround, tailored to your event's unique needs. Whether it's a seminar, fundraiser, or celebration, we provide exceptional coverage that tells your event's story. ​ Contact us today to book your event.Book Now WHAT PEOPLE SAY"Sam's responsiveness gave me a good feeling. After viewing his beautiful art on both is website and on his Instagram page, we scheduled a call. We discussed the timeline of the event and I told him a bit about what I was looking for in our photos--some portraits but plenty of natural and photogenic shots as well. Not only was Sam lovely and super professional, but he captured the evening beautifully! He literally didn't miss a beat!" "These are the best photos I’ve had of myself in a long time. He worked with me to get the results that were just what I wanted and made me look better than I knew I could." "Sam is hands down the best photographer I’ve ever worked with. If you want high quality work from someone that cares about their craft, then look no further. I highly recommend Sam as I’ve also had friends who hired him for events and were delighted with the photos he captured. His meticulous editing skills, capturing all the right moments, and his positive and professional attitude are the perfect combination that make him stand out" Get In TouchLustigPhoto@gmail.com Tel: 513-504-4927Please inquire below for pricing and availabilitySubmit Meet Your Photographer Frequently Asked Questions Event Photography in Philadelphia1. What types of events do you photograph? We specialize in a wide range of events, including corporate conferences, private parties, networking events, fundraisers, and public gatherings. Our goal is to capture the unique essence of each event with high-quality, professional images. ​ 2. How far in advance should we book your services? To ensure availability, we recommend booking at least 3-4 weeks before your event. However, for last-minute inquiries, feel free to reach out, and we’ll do our best to accommodate your needs. ​ 3. What are your rates for event photography? Pricing varies based on event duration, location, and coverage requirements. Contact us for a custom quote tailored to your event. ​ 4. What is included in your event photography packages? Photography coverage of your event Professional editing of all final images High-resolution digital files delivered via an online gallery Optional add-on: On-site professional headshots for guests or employees ​ 5. Can I add headshots to my event booking? Yes! We offer on-site headshot sessions as an add-on to event photography bookings. This is a great option for corporate events, networking sessions, or team gatherings where attendees can update their professional headshots. Contact us to discuss details and pricing. Head over to our Headshot Page to learn more. ​ 6. How are the images delivered, and what is the turnaround time? All edited, high-resolution images are delivered via a secure online gallery. The standard turnaround time is 7-14 business days, but expedited processing is available upon request. ​ 7. Do you charge travel fees for events outside of Philadelphia? There are no travel fees for events within a 50-mile radius of Philadelphia. For locations beyond this range, any additional travel costs will be discussed during booking. ​ 8. How many images can we expect from our event? The number of images depends on the event's duration and activities. On average, clients receive 50+ images per hour of coverage. ​ 9. Do you offer printing services or albums? Yes, we provide professional printing services and custom-designed albums. These can be purchased separately after you receive your digital gallery. ​ 10. Are you equipped to handle low-light or challenging lighting conditions? Absolutely. We use professional lighting and camera equipment to ensure high-quality images, even in low-light venues. ​ 11. How do we book your services? To book, contact us through our website or call/email us directly. We’ll go over the details of your event and pro

pages.description: Product photography with style and personality.  Capture truly unique imagery that shows your brand you how you want it to be seen.  Your brand deserves to look great, inquire today.

headings.text:
Food and Product Photography
in Philadelphia

You deserve great  photography!

And I want to be part of what makes it great.

For this reason, I do not proceed with all inquiries. I only proceed with those that I am certain fit my set of skills and align with my brand values.

If you think we would be a good match to work together, please get in touch by filling out the contact form. I'd love to learn more about you and what you want to accomplish with photography!

Interested in hiring me for a portrait session? 

Click the link below and fill out the form with your name, email, and a good time to talk and we will work out the details.
Click My Face To Learn More
Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability

pages.text_content: Philadelphia Commercial Photographer | Sam Lustig Photo top of pageBOOKING 2026 | LIMITED AVAILABILITY FOR 2025 |LUSTIGPHOTO@GMAIL.COM | (513) 504-4927SAM LUSTIG PHOTOProfessional Photography in PhiladelphiaEVENTSHEADSHOTSHeadshots | What Sets Us ApartHeadshots | RetouchingServicesFOOD & PRODUCTContactAboutPersonalLandscapesClimbingMusicBlogMoreUse tab to navigate through the menu items.Your BrandYour Vision Discover how we can work together Food and Product Photography in PhiladelphiaSample GalleriesRequest Detailed Pricing & Availability InformationRequest Pricing & Availability Request Detailed Pricing & Availability InformationYou deserve great  photography! And I want to be part of what makes it great. For this reason, I do not proceed with all inquiries. I only proceed with those that I am certain fit my set of skills and align with my brand values. If you think we would be a good match to work together, please get in touch by filling out the contact form. I'd love to learn more about you and what you want to accomplish with photography! Let's Talk!Interested in hiring me for a portrait session? Click the link below and fill out the form with your name, email, and a good time to talk and we will work out the details.  Contact Meet Your Photographer Click My Face To Learn MoreFAQHow do you describe your photography style? My style is bright, colorful, and true to life.  I like to work with natural light or to mimic and blend in artificial light with the ambient to create images that are powerful and emotional, but not garish or too theatric. I like to accurately represent my subjects in the most flattering way possible.  I study the art of posing constantly and like to work with people to evoke and capture candid moments within artful posing situations.  I focus on the subtleties, the leading lines of the body, the softness of the hands, the hint of a smile that tells you so much more than "say cheese". ​ Describe a situation when you went above and beyond for client? I try to always go above and beyond for my clients, and because I like to plan meticulously and thoroughly discuss details and logistics, this leads to me rarely running into situations where I need to do anything dramatic to "save the day" for the client. ​ What is your favorite piece of equipment and why? My Canon R5 and my 70-200 f2.8 lens working together are amazing!  The images are so incredibly sharp, the autofocus nails every shot perfectly, the compression of the telephoto combined with the wide aperture creates beautiful separation which allows my images to be all about my subjects.  I really love this lens/camera combo.WHAT PEOPLE SAY"Sam's responsiveness gave me a good feeling. After viewing his beautiful art on both is website and on his Instagram page, we scheduled a call. We discussed the timeline of the event and I told him a bit about what I was looking for in our photos--some portraits but plenty of natural and photogenic shots as well. Not only was Sam lovely and super professional, but he captured the evening beautifully! He literally didn't miss a beat!" "Sam is hands down the best photographer I’ve ever worked with. If you want high quality work from someone that cares about their craft, then look no further. I highly recommend Sam as I’ve also had friends who hired him for weddings and were delighted with the photos he captured. His meticulous editing skills, capturing all the right moments, and his positive and professional attitude are the perfect combination that make him stand out" "These are the best photos I’ve had of myself in a long time. He worked with me to get the results that were just what I wanted and made me look better than I knew I could." Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability513-504-4927LustigPhoto@gmail.com© 2025 BY SAM LUSTIGPrivacy Policybottom of page

pages.title: Retouching | Sam Lustig Photo
pages.description: Retouching Tiers Explained. Explaining the different levels of retouching that can be applied to headshots and portraits.

headings.text: Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability

pages.text_content: Retouching | Sam Lustig Photo top of pageBOOKING 2026 | LIMITED AVAILABILITY FOR 2025 |LUSTIGPHOTO@GMAIL.COM | (513) 504-4927SAM LUSTIG PHOTOProfessional Photography in PhiladelphiaEVENTSHEADSHOTSHeadshots | What Sets Us ApartHeadshots | RetouchingServicesFOOD & PRODUCTContactAboutPersonalLandscapesClimbingMusicBlogMoreUse tab to navigate through the menu items.Retouching TiersUnderstanding the different levels of retouching that we offer through before/after comparisonsThe Raw PhotoHigh End RetouchingStandard Headshot RetouchStandard​This is the raw photo.  Straight out of camera with only a few adjustments made to contrast and saturation.  She looks great, but the treatment of her skin and the color of the overall image isn't perfect, and that's completely normal for a raw photo.  The job of the raw format is to preserve depth of color information that we can then pull out using image editing software. Raw                  ​This is where everything comes together. Flyaway hairs are tamed, skin tone is even, and fine lines are softened with a subtle, natural touch. Eyes are brightened, teeth gently whitened, and any redness or distractions are removed. Hair has a healthy sheen, and blemishes and fine facial hairs are cleaned up with precision. This is the polished, professional image you want representing you online.Raw                                                                        High End ​ ​Our Standard Headshot Retouch includes the essential enhancements you expect from a professionally finished image. Major blemishes are removed, flyaway hairs are controlled, and thoughtful global adjustments are applied to bring balance and polish. This treatment delivers a clean, professional look, without the meticulous detailing of our high-end retouching and at a lower price point. Raw                                                                          Standard Retouch ​ ​And for the sake of comparison, the difference between the Standard vs. High End retouch Treatment. High End RetouchLet's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability513-504-4927LustigPhoto@gmail.com© 2025 BY SAM LUSTIGPrivacy Policybottom of page

pages.title: Headshots | What Sets Us Apart | Sam Lustig Photo
pages.description: Why we can provide you with an easy professional headshot experience even in high volume environments like conventions and conferences.

headings.text: Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability

pages.text_content: Headshots | What Sets Us Apart | Sam Lustig Photo top of pageBOOKING 2026 | LIMITED AVAILABILITY FOR 2025 |LUSTIGPHOTO@GMAIL.COM | (513) 504-4927SAM LUSTIG PHOTOProfessional Photography in PhiladelphiaEVENTSHEADSHOTSHeadshots | What Sets Us ApartHeadshots | RetouchingServicesFOOD & PRODUCTContactAboutPersonalLandscapesClimbingMusicBlogMoreUse tab to navigate through the menu items.What Sets Us ApartYou have many options when deciding who to trust for your headshot.  Here's why we are different. Expert CoachingA Pop Of ColorPerfect Skin Tones RetouchingProof Images Mid SessionBeautiful LightFast DeliveryWe will provide you with the guidance and support you need to create stunning headshots. Our coaching will help you feel relaxed in front of the camera and create beautiful images that will showcase your best self. We'll work with you to find the most flattering angles and poses and always provide variety in the final product, as well as make sure you are comfortable and confident in front of the camera.Add some life to your headshots with a pop of color.  From warm to cool, to grey, black, or white, you have the option to customize the look for you and your company while still being able to create a cohesive look across all of the images for your brand. Achieving accurate skin tones is no easy feat. Using the patented Colorchecker system is an essential part of our process for accurate skin tone. A colorchecker is a tool that photographers use to accurately measure the color of a scene.  By placing the colorchecker in the same light source as the headshot, the photographer can use it to measure the color of the skin in the photograph and make sure it is as accurate as possible. With the help of a colorchecker, we can guarantee that your headshots will represent you in an accurate and flattering way.Retouching is essential to achieve the best results from a headshot. A raw photo is akin to an uncooked meal. Our process creates a stunning final image, removing major blemishes and making skin glow, while retaining a natural look. This is also where background color can be adjusted to the taste of the individual or group. Learn more about retouching tiers here: Retouching TiersBefore                                                After ​ ​We tether to a laptop during our headshot sessions which allows each individual to review their headshots during the session immediately as the photos are taken.  This ensures a satisfactory result from our clients.  Don't like your expression? Cool, lets take some more!Before                                                After ​ ​Professional quality lighting is the key to creating beautiful, flattering portraits. Quality lighting ensures that the subject's features are highlighted and illuminated in the most flattering way, creating a natural, polished look that stands out from the crowd. It also helps to create a professional atmosphere, which allows the subject to feel comfortable and confident in front of the camera.Providing results fast is key to any headshot experience.  Images can be made available the same day upon request.  Let's Talk! Click Here For Detailed Pricing & Availability513-504-4927LustigPhoto@gmail.com© 2025 BY SAM LUSTIGPrivacy Policybottom of page
